sentence: Last week in Gettysburg, a far-right Christian conference called Patriots Arise for God and Country? drew State Sen. Doug Mastriano, a GOP front-runner for Pennsylvania governor; Teddy Daniels, a candidate for lieutenant governor; Maryland gubernatorial candidate Dan Cox; Liz Harrington, a spokesperson for Donald Trump; and former Trump campaign attorney Jenna Ellis.
title: Overnight News Digest: Russia attempts to grind Ukraine down; Sec. Clinton warns of fascism in US
